summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2778 for the improvement of Twenty-seventh Avenue Northeast from the intersection of Twenty-seventh Avenue Northeast and the right of way of the Northern Pacific Railway Company northward to the intersection of said Twenty-seventh Avenue Northeast with East Sixty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 33258, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
